title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
description: As a customer, I want to authenticate securely, so that my portal login and user identity are verified.
attributes_and_rules: Support passwords, OTPs, email verification codes, authenticator apps.
acceptance_criteria: The system should support multiple factors for secure authentication.
test_cases: Given a portal, when a user tries to log in, then the system should prompt for multiple authentication factors.

title: Create Personalized Dashboard
description: As a customer, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can see my customized account information and product offers.
attributes_and_rules: Consolidate account balances, recent transactions, product recommendations, and key updates.
acceptance_criteria: The dashboard should display personalized information based on user profiles.
test_cases: Given a customer profile, when the user views the dashboard, then it should show personalized account and product details.

epic_title: Responsive and Accessible User Interface Design
title: Design Responsive UI
description: As a customer, I want a responsive UI, so that I can have a consistent experience across all devices.
attributes_and_rules: Adhere to accessibility guidelines and ensure performance optimization.
acceptance_criteria: The UI should adapt to various devices and comply with WCAG 2.1.
test_cases: Given various devices, when the user accesses the portal, then the UI should adapt and be accessible.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Enable Account Opening Workflows
description: As a customer, I want guided workflows for account opening, so that I can easily submit requests and modify services.
attributes_and_rules: Provide pre-filled fields and step-by-step automation.
acceptance_criteria: The workflows should allow customers to submit and modify account information efficiently.
test_cases: Given a new account request, when a customer follows the workflow, then the fields should be pre-filled and steps automated.

title: Save and Resume Applications
description: As a customer, I want to save my application progress, so that I can resume from any device securely.
attributes_and_rules: Implement save-state functionality with encrypted session storage.
acceptance_criteria: Customers should be able to save and resume their applications without data loss.
test_cases: Given an incomplete application, when a customer saves and later resumes, then the progress should be intact and secure.

title: Enable Document Upload
description: As a customer, I want to upload documents, so that I can manage my verification files securely.
attributes_and_rules: Support submission in approved formats and ensure encryption.
acceptance_criteria: Customers should be able to securely upload and manage documents.
test_cases: Given document requirements, when a customer uploads files, then the system should validate and store them securely.

title: Implement Request Tracking
description: As a customer, I want to track requests in real time, so that I am informed of updates and approvals.
attributes_and_rules: Provide real-time visibility and automated notifications.
acceptance_criteria: The system should enable real-time tracking and send status notifications.
test_cases: Given an open request, when its status changes, then the customer should be notified automatically.

epic_title: Comprehensive Interaction Log and Audit Trail
title: Maintain Detailed Logs
description: As an admin, I want detailed logs of user activities, so that I can ensure compliance and transparency.
attributes_and_rules: Ensure logs are immutable, encrypted, and timestamped.
acceptance_criteria: The system should maintain comprehensive and secure activity logs.
test_cases: Given user activities, when they occur, then they should be logged immutably and securely.

title: Integrate Core Banking Systems
description: As a bank, I want seamless integration with core systems, so that data is synchronized in real time.
attributes_and_rules: Use secure APIs for synchronization and ensure data integrity.
acceptance_criteria: The portal should synchronize data with core systems reliably and securely.
test_cases: Given core banking data, when updates occur, then the portal should synchronize accurately in real time.

epic_title: Role-Based Access Control and Permissions Management
title: Implement RBAC system
description: As an admin, I want a role-based access control system, so that I can manage user permissions securely.
attributes_and_rules: Define and enforce user permissions based on roles.
acceptance_criteria: The system should enforce access control based on defined user roles.
test_cases: Given user roles, when accessing system resources, then permissions should be granted accordingly.

epic_title: Dedicated Portal Database and Performance Optimization
title: Develop Portal Database
description: As a portal admin, I want a dedicated database, so that portal operations are optimized for performance.
attributes_and_rules: Ensure high-speed performance, data encryption, and regular tuning.
acceptance_criteria: The portal database should be optimized for efficiency and security.
test_cases: Given portal operations, when accessing data, then performance should be optimized consistently.
